question: Which of the following High Courts have Bench/Benches?
explanation: Allahabad, Bombay and Jabalpur High Courts have Benches. Allahabad High Court Bench is situated at Lucknow, Bombay High Court Bench is situated at Nagpur, Panaji and Aurangabad. Jabalpur High Court Bench is situated at Gwalior and Indore.
